title: Advanced User Analytics Dashboard
description: As a product manager, I want an advanced user analytics dashboard so that I can track user behavior patterns, engagement metrics, and conversion funnels to make data-driven product decisions.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Dashboard displays real-time user session data with filtering by date range, user segment, and geographic location
Conversion funnel visualization shows drop-off rates at each stage with drill-down capability to individual user journeys
Cohort analysis charts track user retention over 1, 7, 30, and 90-day periods with customizable cohort definitions
Heat map overlay shows user interaction patterns on key pages with click density and scroll depth metrics
Automated alerts trigger when key metrics deviate beyond configurable thresholds with email/Slack notifications

tasks.description: Design dashboard wireframes and user interface mockups
Implement real-time data pipeline from user events to analytics database
Build interactive dashboard frontend with filtering and visualization components
Implement cohort analysis and funnel tracking algorithms
Set up automated alerting system with configurable thresholds

warnings: Story may be too large - consider breaking into smaller deliverables
suggestions: Consider splitting into separate stories for real-time dashboard, funnel analysis, and alerting system
